Text: O̩la Jihofa ki wʼugbo Maika, e̩ne̩ Mo̩rashe̩t, o̩kpanachi Jotan kpʼEhaz kpai He̩ze̩kaya, amonu Juda, owñ chʼo̩la Samaria kpai Je̩rusale̩m kʼi li.
Me̩ gbo̩ ame̩ amone̩, o̩chaka me̩;
Todu, go, Jihofa dufu kwʼe̩gu-wñ awa me̩,
Uwo uwo la amuyo̩ o̩gane̩ owñ,
Todu ada ki Jeko̩b je̩ oñ e̩wñ-i chaka de̩,
Todule̩ omi ache Samaria ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼugbudu ki dago oko,
Ma la agu ojibo-wñ ku ma gbe̩ le̩ du che ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩,
Todu e-le̩ oñ omi adinaku, u la akwa;
Me̩ ki ka efu Gat in,
Todu onobule̩ kʼi dodo Maro̩t le̩,
Todule̩ uwe̩ ñʼache Mo̩reshe̩t-gat ele e̩gba kʼe̩ lo;
Omi adʼe̩ne̩ ki anʼo̩da-we̩ wa ugbo we̩ ta,
Fʼoji-we̩ la bo̩bo̩lo̩, kʼe̩ fʼiloji-we̩ ja,
